## Code Quality Checklist

- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines (see CLAUDE.md)
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Comments added in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] Documentation updated (CLAUDE.md, README.md, code comments)
- [ ] No debug/test code left in the changeset
- [ ] Memory management reviewed (no leaks, proper smart pointer usage)
- [ ] Error handling added/reviewed

## Documentation Updates

- [ ] CLAUDE.md updated (if architecture changed)
- [ ] README.md updated (if user-facing features changed)
- [ ] Doxygen comments added for new APIs
- [ ] Python docstrings added (if applicable)
- [ ] Examples/tutorials updated (if behavior changed)
